Rebirth Items.itemUnlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by blowing up 30 slot machines.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, rerolls all enemies in the room which are currently alive into another random type of enemy from any floor.; • Dangerous to use in early floors, it could replace a basement enemy with something usually found in the Womb only.; • Cannot reroll mini-bosses or bosses.
Rebirth Items.itemTags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, DIO, dice

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, copies the effect of the tarot card you are currently holding without consuming it.; • The Blank Card can also be used to mimic mystic runes as well as tarot cards.; • An item that often appears in the shop.; In Afterbirth using this with the ? card will teleport you to the I AM ERROR room.
Rebirth Items.itemTags: secret room pool, shop room pool, shop item pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool
Rebirth Items.itemUnlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eden.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, spawns 2-4 friendly blue spiders on the floor.; • Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Allows you to fire a red flame infront of you, similar to the Blue Candle item, however the flame will stay for the current room.; • Each flame deals 125 total damage.; • The flame will shrink in size when deals damage to something and eventually disappear.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Isaac can now pick up hearts while at full health, which will be stored in the Jar and can be spawned again using the spacebar.; • Up to 4 hearts can be stored in The Jar.; • Soul hearts and black hearts cannot be stored.; • If used in a Black heart or Eternal heart super secret room, it will spawn the relevant heart.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, turns every normal enemy in the room into poop!; • Does not work on mini-bosses and bosses.; • Kills poop bosses when used.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, fires a 4 way brimstone laser in all cardinal directions, dealing a lot of damage to any enemies.; • Maximum potential damage is 462 (20-21 ticks of 22 damage if the laser makes contact the whole duration); • Laser damage does not scale with your damage stat.; • Has a chance to drop after you beat Krampus.; • If you get close enough to an enemy that has a large hitbox, you can hit it with 2 of the laser beams, allowing you to deal a lot more damage.; In Afterbirth this item has a 50% chance to rotate like Krampus' spinning attack (25% chance for each direction).
Rebirth Items.itemUnlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Krampus (Krampus is unlocked by taking 20 devil deal items).

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, farts on nearby enemies and knocks them backwards away from Isaac.; • Allows you to reflect projectiles away from Isaac (Afterbirth only feature)

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Upon use, consumes a coin and deals damage to everything in the room.; • Damage dealt is equal to your tear damage 2.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, converts 2 soul or black hearts into 1 red heart container.; • This item will take from your soul hearts first.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, this item will spawn a set of items or consumables based on which floor you are currently on.; • Basement 1: 2 Soul hearts. Basement 2: 2 Bombs + 2 Keys.; • Caves 1: 1 Boss Item. Caves 2: 1 Boss Item + 2 Soul Hearts.; • Depths 1: 4 Soul hearts. Depths 2: 20 coins.; • Womb 1: 2 Boss Items. Womb 2: Bible.; • Blue Womb: Nothing!; • Sheol: 1 Devil Room Item + 1 Black Heart. Cathedral: 1 Angel Room Item + 1 Eternal Heart.; • Chest: 1 coin. Dark Room: Nothing!; • Pandora's Box considers XL floors to always be the first floor of a chapter.

Rebirth Items.itemUnlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Lazarus.

Rebirth Items.itemTags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • +0.25 Speed up.; • Gives huge horns which stick out, allowing you to deal 18 contact damage if you hit something with enough speed.; • Will not deal contact damage unless you are moving fast enough, but does not prevent you from taking damage yourself.; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • +3 Soul Hearts; • After getting hit once, you gain a damage reduction for the rest of the room similar to The Wafer item (-50% damage taken).; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Rebirth Items.itemTags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool, cyan, black, the lost item pool

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Isaac gets a lion's mane and now has the ability to crush rocks by walking over them.; • Crushed rocks and poop can fill holes if you walk in their direction.; • Allows you to crush Red Poops and sometimes not take damage. However, If you also have flying you will always take damage.; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Rebirth Items.itemTags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • A random chance when you take damage to get an invincibility shield for a few seconds (Similar to the Celtic Cross effect but more likely).; • The chance to get an invincibility shield is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.; • Converts all stat down pills into stat up pills. 'Bad Trip' turns into 'Balls of Steel' and 'Amnesia' turns into 'I can see forever'.; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Gives you 6 keys, 6 bombs and 6 coins.; • Balances out your stats to bring the high and low stats closer to an average value.; • All future stat upgrading items will now instead spread out across all other stats. For example, an item which usually gives +1 Damage would instead give a small 'all stats up'.; • Stats effected by this item are: Damage, Tears, Range, Speed.; • When taken with another item which gives an extreme value in a certain stat (e.g. Soy Milk) can lead to interesting synergies.; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Rebirth Items.itemTags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Isaac's tears turn bright green and always apply a poison effect to enemies which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.; • This is essentially a superior version of The Common Cold item.; • Gives Dr. Fetus bombs a big increase in damage.; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • +1 Health Up.; • +0.5 Damage Up.; • -1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).; • +0.1 Speed Up.; • +1.5 Range Up.; • +1 Key, +1 Bomb, +1 Coin.; • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

• Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests.
• Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts.; • Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal.
• Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn.

• Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a bomb on the floor.

• When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches.; • The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room.

This essentially means you are sacrificing your heart drops for a higher chance of all other pickups

• Rocks now drop money when broken.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • +1 Luck Up while held.

Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.; In Afterbirth dying with this trinket causes you to respawn as The Lost character and dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will now unlock the Lost character.

• When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn.; • After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears.
• Causes Isaac to create poops randomly.

• Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets.; • A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.; • Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less.; • Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.; • If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eden.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key.; • Does not work on locked rooms.; In Afterbirth Cain starts with this trinket after donating 68 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.
• While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops.

• Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies.; • The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.; • The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
• Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room.; • Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears.
• Higher chance for champion enemies while held.
• Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear.; • The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
• You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room.
• While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed.; • Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern.

• Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.; • Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).
• Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.
• Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.
• When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Samson.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.; • After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #15 (Slow Roll).

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.; • This trinket can only be removed by picking up the Match Stick trinket, meaning you are otherwise unable to take any more trinkets unless you get the Mom's Purse item.
• If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.
• +0.5 Shot Speed Up.; • Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.; • Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.
• Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • A one-time use item which when used, will duplicate any pedestal items or consumables in the current room.; • If used in a shop, the duplicated items can be taken for free.; • If used on a trinket, another random trinket will spawn instead of a duplicate.; • If used in the Boss Rush, all the duplicates can be taken for free as well as one of the original items.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Shop

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, copies the effect of the pill you are currently holding without consuming it.; • Does not copy effects of Cards or Runes.; • Can be used to generate infinite batteries with the 48 hour energy pill.
• When used, has a 50% chance to drop one random type of coin (penny, nickel or dime)
Afterbirth Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by donating 33 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.; Keeper starts with this item after beating Isaac with Keeper.
Afterbirth Items.itemTags: Shop, Greed Mode, Item Room, starting

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, this item will rewind time and put you back in the previous room, in the same state you were in at that moment.; • This means any damage taken or consumables used in the current room will be reset back to the previous state.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Shop

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac a large white halo around him, that deals a bit of damage to any enemies in contact with the ring.; • Every time an enemy bullet enters the ring, there is a chance it will reflect a homing tear back at the enemy.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Angel Room, Greed Mode, Angel Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • All bomb, coin, key, and battery pickups pickups now have a chance to be replaced with a sack that contains multiple pickups.; • Can lead to game-breaking combinations with the D20 due to the amount of consumables and batteries spawned by the item sacks.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Shop

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac a cone of light infront of him that slows any enemies inside it and their tears.; • The light faces the direction that you are facing, not the direction you are firing.; • Removes Curse of Darkness for the current floor, if picked up on a floor where the curse is active.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Pool

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • A purple familiar fly that follows your exact movement on a 3 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode, Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, places an explosive TNT barrel next to you.; • The TNT barrel can be pushed and used to explode rocks or damage enemies.; • If used a second time in the same room while the last TNT barrel is still there, it will remotely explode the first TNT and not spawn another.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • +4 Soul Hearts; • Fully restores your red health.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Boss Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.; • Has a chance to drop when exploding a dead shopkeeper and also appear in the Gold Chest pool.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Gold Chest, Greed Mode, Gold Chest, Dead shopkeeper

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • A familiar blue fly that will follow Isaac's movement pattern but delayed by 3 seconds.; • Papa Fly will fire tears at nearby enemies that deal damage equal to Isaac's tear damage.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode, Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • A familiar baby that will follow your movement pattern on a 3 second delay. Tears that pass through the baby will double up and increase in damage while flashing black & white.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode, Item Room, Devil Room, Greed Mode, Devil Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Isaac's normal bombs become pink and causes them to drop random pickups when they explode (e.g. keys, coins, bombs).
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode, Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Each time you take damage, My Shadow will apply a fear effect to all enemies in the room and spawn a familiar black charger that will attack for you.; • The charger will be killed if it is damaged too much.
Afterbirth Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Judas.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Devil Room, Greed Mode, Devil Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Every time you kill an enemy a fly will be added to the Jar, allowing you to stack up to 20.; • Using the Jar of Flies will release all the flies that are currently in the jar as friendly flies that will damage enemies.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Shop, Greed Mode, Item Room, Greed Mode, Shop

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • A Loki familiar that follows Isaac and shoots tears 4 tears in a cross pattern.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac a familiar glass of milk that follows him and spills on the floor upon taking damage.; • After being spilt, the milk gives you a Tears Up for the rest of the room.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode, Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, the D7 will restart the current room and bring back all enemies once again, enabling you to farm rewards that spawn at the end after beating the room.; • Can be used to generate infinite consumable combinations, gaining as many coins/keys/bombs as you need.; • Will teleport you to out of the room if used in a Boss Room or Devil Room.; • If used in a greed fight it can be used to reroll the room into a Shop.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • +1 Soul heart; • +0.7 Tears Up.; • Makes Isaac very small like a baby, reducing his hitbox size.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Boss Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • When used, Mom's Box will drop a random trinket on the ground.; • +1 Luck while held.; • While held, doubles the effect of trinkets which make sense to be doubled (e.g. +4 damage from Curved Horn instead of 2, -4 Tear Delay from Cancer instead of 2)
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Shop, Greed Mode, Shop

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. In the burst of tears is a kidney stone which deals a lot of damage.; • -0.2 Speed Down.; • -15 Range Down.; • +2.0 Tear height; • The large decrease in range and tear height increase cause this item to overall be a slight range down.
Afterbirth Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #29 (Onan's Streak).
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode, Item Room

Afterbirth Items.itemDescription: • Upon use, fires a huge Mega Satan laser for 15 seconds, dealing massive damage to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force.; • The laser persists for the entire 15 seconds even between rooms and floors.; • This item appears in the Devil Room but is weighted to be about 5 times rarer than all other devil room items.
Afterbirth Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Mega Satan with every character.
Afterbirth Items.itemPool: Devil Room, Greed Mode, Devil Room

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • While held, tinted rocks and rocks with a crawlspace below them will flash white every 10 seconds.
• Turns all troll bombs into bombs which you can pick up and use.  • Super Troll bombs turn into 1+1 free double bomb pickups.
• Gives your tears a random worm effect every few seconds.
• The possible tear effects include: Whip Worm, Ring Worm, Wiggle Worm, Flat Worm, Hook Worm, Pulse Worm, Tape Worm and Lazy Worm
• -0.4 Shot Speed Down.  • +4.0 Range Up.  • +2.0 Tear Height.
• Every time you get hit, you have a chance to activate the D6, D20, D8 or D12 effect.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with ???.

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • While held this trinket causes all pickups and enemies to move slowly towards you.  • Will also attract the Mom's Foot and Ultra Greed door entities.
• Randomly Isaac will gain a camouflage for a few seconds and all enemies in the current room will have a confused status effect applied to them.
• Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly attack spider while in a hostile room with enemies.
• Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs you place, which damages enemies that walk over it.
• Gives you an increased chance of finding battery consumables.  • Has a chance to add an extra charge to your active item upon completing a room.
• Exploding bombs now have a chance to drop another bomb that you can pick up.
• Higher chance to find crawl spaces when exploding rocks.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #27 (Brains).

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Gives a different trinket effect per room, randomly choosing between any of the other available trinkets in the game.  • Each room is locked to a specific trinket effect, meaning if you exit and re-enter a room, that specific room will always have the same effect.
• Chests now have a 50/50 chance to either pay out with extra consumables or nothing/an enemy.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #26 (I Rule).

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Tears have a stronger knockback effect while this trinket is held
• Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies. e.g. With poison effects, the damage over time poison will last for much longer.
• While held there is a small chance when using a tarot card or pill that a copy of it will be dropped on the floor next to you.
• +0.2 Damage Up for each 'evil' item you have.  • Items classed as evil in this case are Black Candle, Ceremonial Robes, Abaddon, Goat Head, Match Book, Missing Page 2, Safety Pin.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Eve.

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Invincibility lasts longer after getting hit (Increased i-frames)  • This makes it possible to use the Blood Donation machine twice from one hit of damage.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Samson.

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • +15% chance to get a double item room to spawn on the next floor.  • If the effect activates, two items spawn in your item room, however only one can be taken (Same effect as the More Options item)  • The chance doubles to +30% with the effect from Mom's Box.
• Automatically opens all shop room doors for free.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this trinket by donating 666 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.  Keeper starts with this trinket after beating Satan with Keeper.

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Forces the Greed and Super Greed mini bosses to no longer appear in shops or secret rooms.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Ultra Greed with Keeper.

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a Beggar.
Afterbirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating The Lamb boss with Keeper.

Afterbirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Destroying poops now gives you a blue fly
• While held, you heal for half a red heart every time you use a key to open a door or golden chest.  • Changes all half red hearts into full hearts.

• While this trinket is held you have a significantly lower chance to find spacebar/active items.  • It will cause passive items to spawn except when the game cannot generate any more passive items and will then instead choose spacebar/active items.  • Some hard coded spacebar items from bosses and mini-bosses (i.e. Krampus Head) can still spawn.  • Bible drops caused by the Rosary item are not prevented by this trinket.
• Causes your familiars to stay closer to each other.
• Poop in the environment will now explode when destroyed.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • A crown appears above your head and while at exactly 1 full red heart of health, you gain a +1.5 Range Up, +0.7 Tears Up and +0.20 Shot Speed Up; • Any time your health changes to be not exactly 1 red heart you lose the effect; • This item does nothing with The Lost; • Similar to other Tears Up (not Tear Delay) items, if you are already at the soft tear rate cap this item does not give you a tears up.
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium as Azazel.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Gives you a random chance to fire a razor blade which deals 400% damage instead of your normal tears; • +0.4 Tears Up.; • This item also turns your tears red, but does not change your actual damage stat or the damage your normal tears do

• With every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a cluster of tears instead of your normal tear; • Causes your normal tears to fire out of one eye, which means tears will fire in a near-perfect line instead of slightly off-center.; • Each of the tears in the cluster deals double damage

• +0.3 Damage Up; • +0.1 Speed Up; • Upon entering a room with a secret room attached to it or a crawl space trapdoor in it, a wolf howl sound effect will play; • The wolf howl sounds are slightly different depending on if it is identifying a secret room or a crawl space
• While firing, you gain a green aura that poisons any enemies which touch it
• While firing tears, you have a small chance to spawn a poop cloud, which deals periodic damage to any enemies which come near it; • The cloud can be pushed slightly by firing tears at it
• When Isaac takes damage, he has a small chance to gain +5 Range and leave a trail of blood creep behind him as he walks for the current room (similar to the effect of Anemic).
• +1 Soul Heart; • Enemy bullets have a chance to be deflected back at the enemy, which will hurt them and apply the concussive status effect, causing it to be stunned for a few seconds

• This item gives each of your tears a small chance to have the Midas Touch effect, which turns enemies to gold for a few seconds and causes them to drop 1-4 coins if killed while golden; • The effect is shown by a golden coin which appears above the tear; • If the Midas Touch effect triggers, it will remove 1 coin from your current total. While the effect is quite rare, this can still cause you to lose money while fighting an enemy with a lot of health.; • The effect can still trigger even if you have no held coins; • Unlike other similar tear effects, the chance for this ability to activate is not affected by your luck stat
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Keeper.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Drops a random card or rune on pickup; • Doubles the use of any tarot card used; • For some cards this does not double the effect in places where it might be useless (e.g. Stars card only teleports you once)

• Every time you take damage you activate the Tammy's Head effect, which fires 10 high damage tears in a circle around you; • Similar to Tammy's Head, this item synergizes with a lot of items (i.e. with Brimstone it fires 10 lasers)

• Turns your tears into bones, which shatter into 1-3 smaller bone shards upon hitting any object or enemy.; • The smaller bone shards deal damage equal to half your normal tear damage; • +1.5 Range Up
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Lazarus.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Allows Isaac to carry two cards, runes or pills (or any combination of these) at the same time.; • Drops a random card, pill or rune on pickup
• +1.5 Range Up; • Drops a lucky penny
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier Mode with The Lost.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • +1 Health Up
• +1 Soul Heart; • Each time you take damage, Cone Head has a chance to prevent it from reducing your health (similar to the Infamy item)
• Drops one random trinket on pickup; • Gives you an extra trinket slot (same effect as Mom's Purse)

• Isaac's tears have a random chance to be a poisonous booger instead, which stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die; • Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage; • Each booger persists until the enemy is dead or 60 seconds has passed
• Adds a chance to shoot a concussive tear, which will cause enemies to walk around dazed in confusion for a short while.

• This item gives you a chance that instead of firing tears you will fire an egg sack, which slows enemies on hit and drops a pool of white slowing creep below them; • If a parasitoid shot successfully hits an enemy, a blue friendly fly or spider is spawned
• Causes your tears to become piercing, allowing them to travel through enemies; • After hitting its first enemy, each tear will double in damage and gain a homing effect
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Judas.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • +0.3 Damage Up; • Each tear has a chance to become acidic, allowing it to break rocks, pots and other breakable objects (yellow appearance); • Acidic tears can also be used to open secret rooms
• +2 Soul Hearts; • Further item effects are currently unknown
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier mode with Maggy.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • -2 Tear Delay (Tears up); • Allows you to fire tears diagonally by holding down two of the fire buttons at once; • If you are using a gamepad, this item allows you to fire in any direction

• The first enemy you kill in each new room will now explode and poison all nearby enemies, causing them to take periodic damage until they also die and explode; • If you have lots of enemies near each other this can cause a chain reaction, killing lots of enemies in one go

• Gives Isaac a finger which floats infront of him and points in the same direction he is facing or firing. The finger deals constant low damage to all enemies in the same direction that the finger is pointing.; • The finger will also deal damage to entities such as fires and poops; • Applies on-hit status effects such as the burning debuff from Fire Mind
• Isaac gains a shadow familiar that will follow Isaac's movement pattern but delayed by 3 seconds and deal contact damage to enemies
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Judas.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Isaac gains a cloud familiar that follows him and leaves a trail of tears on the floor which damages enemies for 2 damage per tick; • Enemies touching the cloud have a chance to activate the Crack the Sky effect, which spawns a light beam that deals damage equal to your tear damage + 20
• Gives Isaac a small Hush familiar that bounces around the room dealing 2 contact damage per tick; • While firing tears Hushy will stop moving, which allows you to keep it in one place
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Hush with Apollyon.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac a small Monstro familar, who's tears can be charged and released in a shotgun style effect, much like Monstro's main attack; • Lil Mosntro's tears each deal base damage (3.5) and does not scale with damage upgrades

• A baby familiar that follows you and causes other familiars to follow it. It stops moving while Isaac is firing tears and upon releasing the fire button, King Baby will teleport back to your location.; • King Baby will always appear first in the queue of familiars
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Delirium on The Void floor with ???.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • A familiar that follows Isaac and charges forwards very slowly, dealing 2.7 damage per tick to any enemies it comes into contact with.; • Almost identical to the Little Chubby familiar, but this one moves much more slowly and deals less damage
• Upon use, this item deals 9,999,999 damage to all enemies in the room and then kills you 3 seconds later; • This is a single use active item, meaning it is destroyed after using it
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Lazarus.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • When used, the D1 duplicates 1 random pickup in the current room
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Isaac.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • When used, Void will consume any pedestal items in the current room; • If an active item is consumed, its effect will be added to Void's effect when used, allowing you to consume multiple items and combine their effects; • If a passive item is consumed, you gain a small stat upgrade to a random stat; • Void does not work on devil deal or shop items unless they have been bought first; • Using Void to absorb items in Boss Rush or Challenge Rooms counts as taking the items and will cause the encounter to start; • Using Void on one time use items such as Mama Mega or Diplopia will cause their effect to instantly trigger and will not give you further uses through activating Void again.
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Delirium in The Void floor with Apollyon.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Upon use, this item freezes all enemies in the room until you press the fire button again; • Unlike other active items, bosses are not immune to this effect; • Touching a frozen enemy will still hurt you
• Upon use, the Smelter will destroy your currently held trinket and give you the effect permanently, allowing you to stack up lots of different trinket effects
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart on Hard Mode with Apollyon.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • When used, Compost doubles up the current number of blue flies and spiders you have.; • Compost will also destroy every consumable on the ground in the current room and turn each of them into a blue fly or blue spider.; • If you have no pickups on the ground in the current room and no other flies or spiders, Compost will spawn 1 blue fly or blue spider

• When used, this item will distort all the sprites and music, rotating graphics 90 degrees and translating them diagonally up/left, while leaving the hitbox in the same place. This can make it confusing while navigating the room.; • Dataminer will randomly increase or decrease one of your stats by a small amount when used; • Gives you the Fruit Cake effect for the room when used, which will give a random tear effect with every tear fired; • The visual effect resets after leaving the room

• When used, this item will randomly change you into another character, giving you all stat changes associated with the new character; • Also when used, has a chance (seems to be 50%) to remove your most recently picked up item; • This item can only reduce your heart containers and will not increase them if you change back into a character with more health. This means if you roll into The Lost, changing back to another character will leave you with only 1/2 of a soul heart; • Cannot turn you into a character that isn't unlocked yet; • Also includes Lazarus II (Lazarus' revived form) and Black Judas (effect of Judas' Shadow)

• A one time use item that when used will explode all objects (i.e. rocks, poop) in the room and deal 200 damage to all enemies in the current room, as well as every other room for the remainder of the floor; • Also opens the boss rush door after Mom's Foot, blue womb door after Mom's Heart, secret rooms and super secret rooms

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemQuote: I can't believe it's not butter bean!
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Upon use, this item will fart, pushing enemies away and causing a wave of rocks to spawn that spread outwards from Isaac in a circle, dealing 10 damage per hit to any enemies caught in it; • Can be used to open secret rooms; • Visually this item is very similar to Butter Bean

• When used, you have a 50% chance to double all items, consumables and chests in the current room; • If the effect fails, all pickups and items are deleted and Crooked Penny spawns 1 coin; • If there are no consumables currently on the floor, Crooked Penny spawns 1 coin; • This item works with items which can be purchased such as shop items, allowing you to spawn a free version if the effect triggers
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Keeper.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Upon use this item hurts Isaac without actually taking health away, allowing you to activate any items which trigger when taking damage without losing health
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium on The Void floor with Eve.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • When used, this item permanently removes one of your red heart containers and gives you +0.2 Damage Up and a Cube of Meat; • Only works for red hearts and has no effect when used if you only have soul/black hearts; • Has no recharge time and can be used as often as you like
• When used, this item gives you the effect of a random item for the rest of the room
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Eden.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • When picked up, this item gives you a random Dice active item, which will transform into another random dice upon use; • Possible dice include: D4, D6, D8, D10, D12, D20, D100; • All dice given by this item have a 2 room recharge time
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Isaac.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • A one time use active item that when used, will spawns 2 random item pedestals; • Starts with 0 charges and requires 12 charges to use
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Eden.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Every 2 rooms Acid Baby will drop a random pill; • Every time you use a pill, Acid Baby will poison all enemies in the room, dealing double your tear damage to each of them

• A familiar fairy that will float around the room and highlight the location of any secret room doors, tinted rocks or trapdoors under rocks; • Upon entering a new room, if there is an undiscovered secret room or tinted rock, it will move directly to the point of interest, otherwise it will just randomly fly around the room; • +1 Luck Up

• For every empty red heart container, Isaac gains +0.2 Damage Up and his body increases in size; • Only works on full hearts - damage does not change if Isaac is missing 1/2 of a heart in one container.; • Healing empty red heart containers will remove the damage increases

• Isaac gains electric tears, which fire 1-2 sparks of electricty in random directions upon hitting any object or enemy; • The electricty deals half of your normal tear damage; • Tear effects will still apply to your electricty sparks in a lot of cases (e.g. Spoon Bender will give them a homing effect); • The electricty does not self harm Isaac unless you manage to cause a spark to travel through the Multidimensional Baby familiar

• Each tear now has a small chance to be a fire instead, which deals 23 damage to enemies that come in contact with it.; • The fire will remain in place and shrink in size when deals damage to something. After dealing enough damage it will eventually disappear

• Each tear now has a small chance to be a needle instead, which deals 3 times your tear damage.; • If a needle kills an enemy in one shot, it will explode into a circle of 10 more needles, which each also deal 3 times your tear damage; • The chance to for a tear to become a needle is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate every time.
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Lilith.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Upon entering a new room, Isaac will become camouflaged and enemies won't attack until you start firing tears; • Bosses are immune to this effect

• Any time a devil or angel room door opens after a boss, the other one will also spawn; • The extra door will only spawn if a devil or angel room was randomly chosen to spawn already; • After entering one of the doors, the other will disappear; • If there isn't an available wall for the extra door to spawn on, only one door will spawn (i.e. in a small boss room)
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Lilith.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Gives you a 100% chance to find an Angel Room on every valid floor after defeating the boss; • Doesn't spawn an angel room on any floor where it is normally not possible to find one (e.g. Basement 1, Cathedral, Sheol etc.); • Keeps the chance at 100% even after entering and leaving the angel room, meaning the door will not close after visiting; • Makes it impossible to find Devil Rooms again, unless you find a way to remove or reroll this item away
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Maggy.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • A sack familiar that has a random chance to drop a sack at the end of each room
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode as Cain.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Gives you an extra heart container for every 25 coins you are currently holding, up to a maximum of 4 extra HP at 99 coins held; • If your coin counter goes below the required amount for a heart container, you will lose it again
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #35 (Pong).

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • Gives you a random chance while firing tears to also fire a creep shot, which deals double your tear damage and places white creep on the floor infront of you that slows enemies down if they walk through it; • Unlike some similar tear effects, your luck stat does not alter the chance for this effect to activate
• While firing tears you have a chance to fire a piercing void tear, that will instantly kill enemies it comes into contact with; • The effect will not kill any boss or miniboss

• When used, will spawn a fly turret that doesn't move and fires tears at nearby enemies; • Only persists for the current room; • The fly's bullets deal 2 damage each and do not scale with your own damage stat
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Ultra Greed as Apollyon.

AfterbirthPlus Items.itemDescription: • At the start of each new hostile room, you have a chance to gain a random charmed familiar which will fight for you; • The charmed enemy has its own health bar and will die if it takes enough damage; • Charmed enemies persist between each room and floor for as long as they stay alive; • Allows you to have more than one charmed familiar at a time if you can keep them alive

• Every time one of your tears hits an enemy, it has a chance to start bleeding, which will cause it to take damage equal to 10% of its total health every 5 seconds.; • Damaging enemies from behind gives the bleed effect a 100% chance to apply; • The tear that inflicts the bleed effect also deals double damage; • The bleed effect cannot be applied to immune enemies (e.g. bosses and mini bosses)

• When used, Sharp Straw will deal damage to all enemies in the room; • At base damage of 3.5, damage dealt by this item equals roughly 20-25% of the enemy's maximum health. This percentage will scale up based on your damage stat; • Every time this item deals damage to an enemy, it has a chance to drop 1/2 red hearts or 1/2 soul hearts.

• A razor blade orbital that deals contact damage and applies the bleeding status effect to enemies, which will cause them to take damage equal to 10% of their total health every 5 seconds; • The contact damage dealt by Mom's Razor is equal to 20% of your current tear damage (scales with damage upgrades); • Does not block enemy shots; • Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item

• An eye orbital that shoots a tear every 2 seconds that deals 3.5 damage and deals 2 contact damage per tick to enemies; • Tears will fire in the direction it is currently facing and do not target enemies; • The damage dealt by this orbital does not scale with damage upgrades; • Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item

• When used, spawns a charmed random white delirium version of a boss, that will fight for you and kill other enemies for the rest of the current room; • Possible bosses spawned include most bosses in the game
AfterbirthPlus Items.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium for the first time on any character.

AfterbirthPlus Trinkets.itemDescription: • While held you have an increased chance for Black Poops to spawn, which deal damage to all enemies in the room when destroyed; • Gives The Poop active item a chance to spawn a Black Poop too
AfterbirthPlus Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with ???.

AfterbirthPlus Trinkets.itemDescription: • Gives you extra stat upgrades based on the items you've already collected that have stat increases, at roughly +30% of the item's original increase; • Also gives you a tears up if you don't already have an item that increases your tears stat
• The effect of this trinket is currently unknown!
• Items and trinkets which generate blue flies and spiders will have double the effect, causing twice as many to spawn
• Some tears will randomly become a black tooth, that can poison enemies
• Tears now have a giant arcing behaviour which moves quickly in a spiral pattern across the room

• Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to gain a Tonsil familiar, which follows you and blocks enemy projectiles; • This effect can happen twice before the Tonsil trinket is destroyed

• Your tears have a random chance to become booger tears; • Booger tears stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die or 60 seconds passes. Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
• Some random tears will gain the Rubber Cement effect and become bouncy
• This trinket will give you +1 to all stats for as long as you are holding a fully charged active item
• Grants +0.5 Speed, +1.5 Range, +0.3 Shot Speed, +0.4 Tears, +1.5 Damage when Isaac's active item is completely uncharged
• Gives you another secret room on each future floor while held; • Does not spawn more than one super secret room, only the normal secret room
